attributes.action: Make facebook give Spiky Mike his name back
attributes.background:
Spiky Mike ,a stage name he has used for two decades in all matters relating to comedy promotion FUNHOUSE  .Much work comes to him through social media and F/B 's insistence that he must use his "real " name Micheal bottomley  is an obstruction
to his work and no doubt a loss to many comics

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of Facebook, not the UK Government or Parliament. Facebook makes its own operational decisions. 

You might like to contact them directly about this issue.
